processorSpecParameters.name: job_kwargs.n_jobs
processorSpecParameters.description: Number of jobs, must be a positive number between 0 and 1, or -1 for all processors.

processorSpecParameters.name: recording_context.electrical_series_path
processorSpecParameters.description: Path to the electrical series in the NWB file

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.add_preprocessed_to_output_nwb
processorSpecParameters.description: Whether to add preprocessed data to output NWB file or not

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_filter.freq_min
processorSpecParameters.description: Minimum frequency for the highpass filter

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.phase_shift.margin_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: Margin in milliseconds for phase shift

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_spatial_filter.apply_agc
processorSpecParameters.description: Whether to apply automatic gain control

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_spatial_filter.agc_window_length_s
processorSpecParameters.description: Window length in seconds for AGC

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.highpass_spatial_filter.highpass_butter_wn
processorSpecParameters.description: Natural frequency for the Butterworth filter

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.strategy
processorSpecParameters.description: What strategy to use for motion correction

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.localize_peaks_kwargs.enforce_decrease
processorSpecParameters.description: Enforce spatial decreasingness for PTP vectors

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.localize_peaks_kwargs.feature
processorSpecParameters.description: 'ptp', 'energy' or 'peak_voltage'. The available features to consider for estimating the position via monopolar triangulation are peak-to-peak amplitudes (ptp, default), energy ('energy', as L2 norm) or voltages at the center of the waveform (peak_voltage)

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.direction
processorSpecParameters.description: 0 | 1 | 2. Dimension along which channel_locations are shifted (0 - x, 1 - y, 2 - z).

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.border_mode
processorSpecParameters.description: 'remove_channels' | 'force_extrapolate' | 'force_zeros'. Control how channels are handled on border.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.spatial_interpolation_method
processorSpecParameters.description: The spatial interpolation method used to interpolate the channel locations.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_nonrigid_accurate.interpolate_motion_kwargs.num_closest
processorSpecParameters.description: Number of closest channels used by 'idw' method for interpolation.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.localize_peaks_kwargs.radius_um
processorSpecParameters.description: Radius in um for channel sparsity.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.localize_peaks_kwargs.feature
processorSpecParameters.description: 'ptp', 'mean', 'energy' or 'peak_voltage'. Feature to consider for computation

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.direction
processorSpecParameters.description: 0 | 1 | 2. Dimension along which channel_locations are shifted (0 - x, 1 - y, 2 - z).

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.border_mode
processorSpecParameters.description: 'remove_channels' | 'force_extrapolate' | 'force_zeros'. Control how channels are handled on border.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.spatial_interpolation_method
processorSpecParameters.description: The spatial interpolation method used to interpolate the channel locations.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_rigid_fast.interpolate_motion_kwargs.num_closest
processorSpecParameters.description: Number of closest channels used by 'idw' method for interpolation.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.radius_um
processorSpecParameters.description: Radius in um for channel sparsity.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.upsampling_um
processorSpecParameters.description: Upsampling resolution for the grid of templates.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.sigma_um
processorSpecParameters.description: Spatial decays of the fake templates.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.sigma_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: The temporal decay of the fake templates.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.margin_um
processorSpecParameters.description: The margin for the grid of fake templates.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.percentile
processorSpecParameters.description: The percentage in [0, 100] of the best scalar products kept to estimate the position.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.localize_peaks_kwargs.sparsity_threshold
processorSpecParameters.description: The sparsity threshold (in [0, 1]) below which weights should be considered as 0.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.direction
processorSpecParameters.description: 0 | 1 | 2. Dimension along which channel_locations are shifted (0 - x, 1 - y, 2 - z).

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.border_mode
processorSpecParameters.description: 'remove_channels' | 'force_extrapolate' | 'force_zeros'. Control how channels are handled on border.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.spatial_interpolation_method
processorSpecParameters.description: The spatial interpolation method used to interpolate the channel locations.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.motion_correction.motion_kwargs_kilosort_like.interpolate_motion_kwargs.num_closest
processorSpecParameters.description: Number of closest channels used by 'idw' method for interpolation.

processorSpecParameters.name: preprocessing_context.max_bad_channel_fraction_to_remove
processorSpecParameters.description: Maximum fraction of bad channels to remove

processorSpecParameters.name: spikesorting_context.scheme2_max_num_snippets_per_training_batch
processorSpecParameters.description: Scheme 2 max number of snippets per training batch

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.waveforms_raw.return_scaled
processorSpecParameters.description: Flag to determine if results should be scaled

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.waveforms.return_scaled
processorSpecParameters.description: Flag to determine if results should be scaled

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.spike_amplitudes.return_scaled
processorSpecParameters.description: Flag to determine if amplitudes should be scaled

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.spike_amplitudes.outputs
processorSpecParameters.description: Output format for the spike amplitudes

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.correlograms.window_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: Size of the window in milliseconds

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.correlograms.bin_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: Size of the bin in milliseconds

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.isis.window_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: Size of the window in milliseconds

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.isis.bin_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: Size of the bin in milliseconds

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.presence_ratio.bin_duration_s
processorSpecParameters.description: Duration of the bin in seconds.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.bin_size_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: The size of binning for the autocorrelogram in ms, by default 0.25.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.window_size_s
processorSpecParameters.description: Window in seconds to compute correlogram, by default 1.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.exclude_ref_period_below_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: Refractory periods below this value are excluded, by default 0.5

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.sliding_rp_violation.max_ref_period_ms
processorSpecParameters.description: Maximum refractory period to test in ms, by default 10 ms.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.amplitude_cutoff.num_histogram_bins
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of bins to use to compute the amplitude histogram.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.amplitude_cutoff.histogram_smoothing_value
processorSpecParameters.description: Controls the smoothing applied to the amplitude histogram.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.amplitude_cutoff.amplitudes_bins_min_ratio
processorSpecParameters.description: The minimum ratio between number of amplitudes for a unit and the number of bins. If the ratio is less than this threshold, the amplitude_cutoff for the unit is set to NaN.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nearest_neighbor.max_spikes
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of spikes to use, per cluster. Note that the calculation can be very slow when this number is >20000.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nearest_neighbor.n_neighbors
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of neighbors to use.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.max_spikes
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of spikes to use, per cluster. Note that the calculation can be very slow when this number is >20000.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.n_neighbors
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of neighbors to use.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.n_components
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of PC components to use to project the snippets to.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_isolation.radius_um
processorSpecParameters.description: The radius, in um, that channels need to be within the peak channel to be included.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.max_spikes
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of spikes to use, per cluster. Note that the calculation can be very slow when this number is >20000.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.n_neighbors
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of neighbors to use.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.n_components
processorSpecParameters.description: The number of PC components to use to project the snippets to.

processorSpecParameters.name: postprocessing_context.quality_metrics.qm_params.nn_noise_overlap.radius_um
processorSpecParameters.description: The radius, in um, that channels need to be within the peak channel to be included.

processorSpecParameters.name: curation_context.curation_query
processorSpecParameters.description: Query to select units to keep after curation. Default is 'isi_violations_ratio < 0.5 and amplitude_cutoff < 0.1 and presence_ratio > 0.8'.
